thread.title: Paris Hilton suffers a DOUBLE wardrobe malfunction | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Paris Hilton suffers a DOUBLE wardrobe malfunction | Daily Mail Online

author: Becky Freeth For Mailonline
title: Paris Hilton suffers a DOUBLE wardrobe malfunction | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Matching to her diamonds, The Simple Life reality star wore metallic shoes and a dazzling handbag with her floor-sweeping glitter gown. It was therefore all the more disappointing when the blonde bombshell nearly tripped up in the dress, forced to bend over and rearrange the train. Oops moment: The model then got her heel caught in her dress when she moved along the red carpet Don't swish too hard: Spinning around to flick her long hair, the star exposed an oversized cut to the top of her dress It was at that moment that Paris managed to save herself from a second mishap with the cowl neckline. A busty Paris laughed as she rearranged her cleavage to make sure everything was secure. It was a big night for model, who was on hand to receive Fragrance Of the Year award for her perfume, Gold Rush. Romance revealed: Ahead of the event, Paris shared an Instagram with new boyfriend Chris Zylka, revealing their romance ahead of their first public appearance together The Hilton Hotels heiress is known to have built a $2m empire with her line of fragrances. Yet more exciting was that it was to be her first public outing with new boyfriend Chris Zylka. Paris unmasked her mystery man just hours before the red carpet, sharing a romantic Instagram with The Leftovers actor. As he was seen nuzzling into her neck, she shared the shot with the caption: 'Live. Love. Sparkle...' Winner, winner: Paris collected the Fragrance Of the Yearaward for her perfume, Gold Rush Fragrance queen: The star is known for her fragrance empire Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
